channel.title: Civil War at the RNC
channel.description:
At the Republic National Convention, there was somewhat of a civil war between the current Republican Party Leadership and the Ron Paul People. Was curious if anyone had any thoughts about it:
http://youtu.be/IrYdBL7BFwE

item.title: Civil War at the RNC
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:9, topic:457490”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=560413.msg4092223#msg4092223 date=1346494792]

Why even support that old man, yes he is consistent, but that doesn’t make him good.

Makes him better than everyone else running for office.
[/quote]
What about Gary Johnson?
Ron Paul must have some brain decease, when he still goes to a party where he is not invited.[/quote]
Does it really matter?

Read full topic

[/quote]

Makes him better than everyone else running for office.[/quote]

Ron Paul must have some brain decease, when he still goes to a party where he is not invited.

item.title: Civil War at the RNC
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

I never said the Dem didn’t

Read full topic

item.title: Civil War at the RNC
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“meiscooldude, post:4, topic:457490”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=560413.msg4091641#msg4091641 date=1346445532]
LEAVE THE PARTY IF YOU DON’T LIKE IT. You left Europe because you didn’t like it, why treat GOP any different?
[/quote]

I myself have left the party, but I do believe leaving just because you don’t like something is always the right solution… however that’s a different topic.

With the pretty open and rampant voter fraud, and suppression of free speech, should the republican party even be recognized?[/quote]
Dems and GOP both participate in rampant voter fraud.

Read full topic

item.title: Civil War at the RNC
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

Bowser jr:

LEAVE THE PARTY IF YOU DON’T LIKE IT. You left Europe because you didn’t like it, why treat GOP any different?

I myself have left the party, but I do believe leaving just because you don’t like something is always the right solution… however that’s a different topic.

With the pretty open and rampant voter fraud, and suppression of free speech, should the republican party even be recognized?
